entity.name: Grellan's Grove
entity.entry:
A place of magic and mystery filled with rangers and druids, it is where the [note:6862012|Old Gods] still have great meaning to the people. Citizen of the empire feel a little out of place when visiting the grove. But make no mistake, the grove is loyal to the empire and the [character:6815195|Thane] is extremely loyal and will levy troops, fighting against all enemies in support of the Empire if [character:6801107|Praetor Glaber] should put out the call.

There are rumors that the [character:6815195] commands the power to walk between the worlds, but most take this to means she is comfortable in [location:6800997] or the forests surrounding the Grove. It's only the conspiracy theorists like [character:6851527|Dr Dee] who think it means more than that. Maybe they are talking about the Feywilds, because there are an inordinate number of gnomes, elves and half-elves residing in the Grove.
